<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">623e46031be455106a08a9b4bd4bcba1</macroponent><name>Conditionally refresh special handing notes data broker</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, helpers, imports }) {
    const { name } = event.payload;
    const SHNDisplayed = api.state.specialHandlingNotesDisplayed;
    const isActiveScreen = api.context.props.screen.isActive;
    
    //Not refresh Special Handing Notes data resource when it's displayed before or current screen is inactive
    if (SHNDisplayed || !isActiveScreen)
        return;
    

    if (name == 'activityLogs') {
        const activityLogsMap = api.context.props.activityLogs;
        if (activityLogsMap.size === 0)
            return;

        var activityEntries = Array.from(activityLogsMap.values());

        //Only fetch the lastest activity entry
        const activityEntry = activityEntries[activityEntries.length - 1];
        const activityArray = activityEntry.activities.get('crud');
        if (activityArray.length === 0)
            return;

        //Only fetch the lastest operation
        const { operation } = activityArray[activityArray.length - 1];
        if (operation === 'inserted' || operation === 'updated') {
            api.data.get_special_handling_notes.refresh();
        }
    }

    if (name == 'screen') {
        const { value, previousValue} = event.payload;
        //Refresh Special Handling Notes resource when switch focus on current screen(tab)
        if (value.isActive && !previousValue.isActive) {
            api.data.get_special_handling_notes.refresh();
        }
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>David.Admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-12 06:28:48</sys_created_on><sys_id>fe3ec2431be455106a08a9b4bd4bcba6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Conditionally refresh special handing notes data broker</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Working From Home (WFH)" source="x_852034_wfh">ca4c5dfd1ba811106a08a9b4bd4bcb1f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Working From Home (WFH)">ca4c5dfd1ba811106a08a9b4bd4bcb1f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_fe3ec2431be455106a08a9b4bd4bcba6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>David.Admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-12 06:35:49</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
